headline.main: The Afghan Front: Lessons of Vietnam

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''A Military Quagmire Remembered: Afghanistan as Vietnam'' (news analysis, Oct. 31):
abstract: Ellen Willis letter on Oct 31 analysis of any parallels between American campaign in Afghanistan and Vietnam war
